title: Does Melania Trump have to pay tribute to Princess Diana? - Quora

response.answer_text: No. Diana is dead and won’t be any kind of a factor. Even if she were still alive, there would be no requirement to “pay tribute” to her. I’m quite sure Melania is capable of conducting herself in a polite manner, but there’s no need for an American to pay tribute to anyone in any foreign country. She won’t need to curtsy, bow, grovel, pay obeisance, or anything else.

Does Melania Trump have to pay tribute to Princess Diana? Diana has been dead for more than 20 years. What kind of tribute would you suggest? trump’s wife will be expected to behave civilly to the Duchess of Cornwall. I doubt anyone will ask much more of that of trump’s wife.
